entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, referred to as 'he' and 'him'. He is getting ready for bed.

entities.name: hedwig
entities.description: Harry's owl, mentioned as returning. The text implies that Hedwig has gone out and will return with a letter or package.

relationships.description: Harry owns Hedwig, as indicated by the fact that he is waiting for her to return with a letter or package.
